description: Add a new Large Scale VPN object. When used inside a VPN Community, the object enables communication between a large amount of externally managed VPN peers.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: name
body.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

body.name: certificate-authority
body.description: Trusted Certificate authority for establishing trust between VPN peers, identified by name or UID.

body.name: allowed-ip-addresses
body.description: Collection of network objects identified by name or UID that represent IP addresses allowed in profile's VPN domain.

body.name: restrict-allowed-addresses
body.description: Indicate whether the IP addresses allowed in the VPN Domain will be restricted or not, according to allowed-ip-addresses field.

body.name: limit-peer-domain-size
body.description: Use this parameter to limit the number of IP addresses in the VPN Domain of each peer according to the value in the max-allowed-addresses field.

body.name: max-allowed-addresses
body.description: Maximum number of IP addresses in the VPN Domain of each peer. This value will be enforced only when limit-peer-domain-size field is set to true. Select a value between 1 and 256. Default value is 256.

success.name: name
success.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

success.name: allowed-ip-addresses
success.description: Collection of network objects identified by name or UID that represent IP addresses allowed in profile's VPN domain.

success.name: certificate-authority
success.description: Trusted Certificate authority for establishing trust between VPN peers, identified by name or UID.

success.name: restrict-allowed-addresses
success.description: Indicate whether the IP addresses allowed in the VPN Domain will be restricted or not, according to allowed-ip-addresses field.

success.name: limit-peer-domain-size
success.description: Use this parameter to limit the number of IP addresses in the VPN Domain of each peer according to the value in the max-allowed-addresses field.

success.name: max-allowed-addresses
success.description: Maximum number of IP addresses in the VPN Domain of each peer. This value will be enforced only when limit-peer-domain-size field is set to true. Select a value between 1 and 256. Default value is 256.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

add lsv-profile with peer VPN Domain lim.description: Add an LSV Profile with a maximum number of IP addresses in the VPN Domain of each peer

add lsv-profile with restricted encrypti.description: Add an LSV Profile with restricted allowed IP addresses in the VPN Domain
